name: time_of_possession_time
title: At what time on Close of Escrow would you like to take possession of the property?
label: Possession Time
description: At what time on Close of Escrow would you like to take possession of the property?
tips: End of business day is typical. Choose a time that works best for your moving schedule. Coordinate with the seller to ensure a smooth transition.
small_print: The date and time of possession shall be as set forth in the purchase agreement and escrow instructions, and possession shall be subject to the rights of any tenants or other parties in possession.

internal.notes: Time of possession on Close of Escrow

time_of_possession_time.name: time_of_possession_time
time_of_possession_time.tooltip: Select the time you want to take possession on Close of Escrow
